Description: Global performance market for the operation and maintenance of heating, ventilation and air conditioning (HVAC) installations, with energy performance guarantee from the City of Sottevill... This market aims to reduce consumption energy assets of the City of Sotteville-lès-Rouen. Also, the Operator undertakes, through its operation and under its P3 service and equipment renewal, to reduce heat consumption for each site. Furthermore, the quality of service is crucial to guarantee the comfort of users of the buildings of the City of Sotteville-lès-Rouen. Thus, the Operator makes every effort to guarantee compliance with the contractual provisions mentioned in this contract as well as as optimal continuity of service. The contract duration takes into account the duration of the investments to which is added the operation-maintenance period. The latter must be sufficiently representative in order to be able to measure the expected performance of the incumbent. This consultation is aimed at economic operators specializing in the operation of heating. Economic operators or groups: no form of group is imposed by the contracting authority. THE contracting authority prohibits candidates from presenting their offers by acting at the same time: 1° As individual candidates and members of one or more groups 2° As members of several groups Economic operators can apply as a group. input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: MUNICIPALITY OF CARCASSONNE. Summary: Public Service Delegation for the Design, Creation and Operation of the Heat Network in the Bastide Saint Louis District in the Community of Carcassonne. Description: The purpose of this consultation is to entrust a concessionaire with the design, financing, construction and operation of the heating network in the Bastide Saint Louis district of the city of Carcassonne. It follows a deliberation No. 037 dated June 26, 2025, by which the City of Carcassonne approved the principle of public service delegation. The Contract will be executed at the Concessionaire's own risk, in application of the general principles of concession law and of all legal and regulatory provisions in force at the time of its execution. In particular, the Concessionaire will assume a risk linked to the operation of the services, the part of the risk transferred being understood within the meaning of the second paragraph of Article L. 1121-1 of the Public Procurement Code. The value of the concession is €37 million excluding tax (cumulative turnover over the duration of the contract in the feasibility study). PUBLIC SERVICE DELEGATION FOR THE DESIGN, CREATION AND OPERATING OF THE HEAT NETWORK IN THE BASTIDE SAINT LOUIS DISTRICT IN THE COMMUNITY OF CARCASSONNE. The purpose of the public service concession contract is to entrust to a private delegate: - The construction of the works necessary for the deployment of the heating network; - Operation, upkeep and maintenance, major upkeep and renewal of network installations - Production and distribution of heat to subscribers - Relationship management.... Published Date: 2025-12-26. Closing Date: 2026-03-26. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Summary: Public Service Delegation for the Design, Creation and Operation of the Heat Network in the Bastide Saint Louis District in the Community of Carcassonne

The Contract will be executed at the Concessionaire's own risk, in application of the general principles of concession law and of all legal and regulatory provisions in force at the time of its execution. In particular, the Concessionaire will assume a risk linked to the operation of the services, the part of the risk transferred being understood within the meaning of the second paragraph of Article L. 1121-1 of the Public Procurement Code. input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: DEPARTMENTAL COUNCIL OF THE ARDENNES. Summary: Supply and Delivery of Jet A1 and Avgas 100Ll Type Aviation Fuel to the Ardennes Belval Aerodrome Site (Near Charleville-Mézières).. Description: The contract covers the following services: Supply and delivery of aviation fuel of the JET A1 and AVGAS 100LL type to the site of the Ardennes de Belval aerodrome (near Charleville-Mézières) The purpose of this contract is the supply and the delivery of JET A1 and AVGAS 100LL type aviation fuels to the Belval aerodrome site (08090) in the Ardennes. The services requested from the holder of this framework agreement are as follows: - the supply of JET A1 jet fuel delivered into the external tank by pumping from the truck to the tank - the supply of AVGAS 100LL fuel delivered into the external tank by pumping from the truck to the tank - the provision of the documents necessary for fuel checks for each delivery - the training of personnel intended to ensure reception, control of storage methods and product quality - All 1st level maintenance services for fuel installations (tanks and machines). Published Date: 2025-12-23. Closing Date: 2026-01-30. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: DUNKIRK HOSPITAL CENTER. Summary: Works Contract for the Restructuring and Extension of the Technical Platform of the Saint-Omer Regional Hospital Center (Complementary Aoo Lot C and D). Description: This consultation concerns a works contract for the restructuring and extension of the technical platform of the Saint-Omer Regional Hospital Center. This consultation went through an open call for tender procedure, carried out under articles L.2124-2, R.2124-1, R2124-2 1° and R.2161-2 to R.2161-5 of the Public Procurement Code. As part of the previous procedure, lots C and D were declared without further action, in particular due to a poor definition of the need. Consequently, this consultation aims to relaunch these lots in order to allow effective competition and lead to the award of the corresponding contracts: LOT C: Heating - Ventilation - Air conditioning - Smoke extraction - Sanitary plumbing LOT D: Electricity Strong Currents - Weak Currents Doc Title: Works contract for the restructuring and extension of the technical platform of the Hospital Center of the Saint-Omer Region (complementary AOO lot C and D) Contract Type: works. The consultation follows a first procedure declared without further action for reason of general interest The market is broken down into a firm tranche and 7 optional tranches. input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: DEPARTMENT OF SAÔNE-ET-LOIRE. Summary: Establishment of an Operating Market for Climate Engineering Installations in Buildings in the Department of Saône-Et-Loire. Description: Establishment of an operating market for climate engineering installations in buildings in the Department of Saône-et-Loire This market will include the following services: - P1 Energy: Supply of fuel necessary for the production of heating and DHW in the form of a market: MTI - Temperature market with profit-sharing MCI - Meter market with profit-sharing CP - Fuel service market - P2 Maintenance: Operation, maintenance, upkeep and monitoring services for engineering installations thermal for all sites and equipment listed in Appendix 1 of the CCTP. - P3 Total Guarantee: Major maintenance services and total guarantee of thermal engineering installations on all sites. The P3 will be of the GTR type (total guarantee with distribution). This is an operation and maintenance contract, lasting 5 years from the date of notification of the contract with possible renewal once for a period of 3 years, i.e. a maximum total duration of 8 years. The visit of sites is not obligatory but recommended, refer to the stipulations of article 6.1 of the consultation regulations. Doc Title: Establishment of an operating market for climate engineering installations in buildings of the Department of Saône-et-Loire Contract Type: services. Published Date: 2025-12-17. Closing Date: 2026-01-30. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

The P3 will be of the GTR type (total guarantee with distribution). input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: COMMUNITY OF COMMUNES OF PAYS DE FALAISE. Summary: Contract N°2025-13: Restructuring of a Former Industrial Site in Falaise. Description: The Community of Communes of Pays de Falaise is carrying out a project to rehabilitate the former SATAM activity building (industrial company established for over 70 years in Falaise, specializing in legal metrology, design, manufacturing, implementation). service and maintenance of volumetric meters in the petroleum sector). This restructuring will allow the Pays de Falaise Community of Communes to sustain jobs in its catchment area and will benefit from suitable surface areas for growth. of its head office. Indeed, the restructuring project will consist of: -Rehabilitation and adaptation of the office space so that it becomes the head office of the Community of Communes of Pays de Falaise (CCPF), (approximately 1,100m²), -Rehabilitation, division of the workshop space to offer business real estate (around 4,000 m²). In addition, this restructuring project is fully in line with the policy of limiting land consumption and the resorption of industrial or industrial wastelands. of wastelands to come. A first phase of work consisting of the decontamination and demolition of the site is underway and should be completed at the beginning of April 2026. This call for tenders concerns the rehabilitation work of the building. LOT 1: VRD - EARTHWORKS - GREEN SPACES LOT 2: FENCES - GATES LOT 3: MAJOR WORK LOT 4: METAL FRAMEWORK LOT 5: WOODEN FRAMEWORK LOT 6: COVERING - WATERPROOFING LOT 7: CLADDING LOT 8: LOCKSMITH LOT 9: CLOSED.... Published Date: 2025-12-17. Closing Date: 2026-02-06. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: GRDF. Summary: Vsic Inactive/Unproductive - Paca / Idf. Description: Unproductive VSIC: The VSIC project aims to guarantee compliance of non-active connections for which gas delivery has been interrupted for more than 2 years following a termination request by a supplier with the new regulations relating to gas installations in residential buildings. Article 27 of the revised decree of February 23, 2018 requires connections terminated more than 2 years ago: A physical locking of the Cutoff Device in the closed position with a device preventing its operation and a blocking upstream of the penetration of the housing. With, in the event of impossibility of closing the outside of the housing, securing the connection by a device preventing access to the cutting device and closing the connection inside the accommodation. Inactive VSIC: Inactive meter removal market. The services of the VSIC Inactive activity include: - Processing inactive counters - Closing the outside of the connections for the meters inaccessible when the configuration allows it - Mechanical locking in the closed position of the OCI The documents to be submitted for the consultation are: - K-BIS less than 3 months old - If applicable, copy of the judgment(s) pronounced under the judicial recovery - Social regularity certificates - Certificate of tax regularity - Declaration on honor of authorization to tender -DC1 -DC2 - Power of commitment completed and signed - Engage.... The P3 will be of the GTR type (total guarantee with distribution). This is an operation and maintenance contract, lasting 5 years from the date of notification. of the market with possible renewal once for a period of 3 years, i.e. a maximum total duration of 8 years. input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: SIGERLY. Summary: Group of Orders for the Supply of Natural Gas and Associated Services. Description: This consultation concerns the supply, transportation of natural gas and associated services. Its purpose is the conclusion, on behalf of the members of the order group, of a framework agreement for: i€ The supply and delivery of natural gas to the delivery points (PDL), the current list of which is presented to the CCTP-C and the final list of which will be presented in the annexes of each subsequent contract for the members of the order group, the current list of which is presented in the annex to the CCAP-C and the final list of which will be presented in the annex to each subsequent contract; i€ Coverage of storage obligations; i€ Coverage of obligations associated with energy savings certificates; i€ Coverage of obligations to return biogas production certificates to the State, in accordance with articles R-446-113 to R446-124 of the energy code; i€ Coverage of obligations associated with the Second Emissions Trading System (SEQE2) (subject to transcription into National Law); i€ Invoicing, including the transmission of invoices via CHORUS PRO i€ Managing relations with the Manager from the Distribution Network within the framework of a single contract, to the public distribution network; i€ Mandatory service provisions described in the common specific administrative clauses (CCAP-C) and the common specific technical clauses (CCTP-C).. Published Date: 2025-11-17. Closing Date: 2025-12-17. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Summary: Group of Orders for the Supply of Natural Gas and Associated Services
output.Description: This consultation concerns the supply, transportation of natural gas and associated services. Its purpose is the conclusion, on behalf of the members of the order group, of a framework agreement for: i€ The supply and delivery of natural gas to the delivery points (PDL), the current list of which is presented to the CCTP-C and the final list of which will be presented in the annexes of each subsequent contract for the members of the order group, the current list of which is presented in the annex to the CCAP-C and the final list of which will be presented in the annex to each subsequent contract; i€ Coverage of storage obligations; i€ Coverage of obligations associated with energy savings certificates; i€ Coverage of obligations to return biogas production certificates to the State, in accordance with articles R-446-113 to R446-124 of the energy code; i€ Coverage of obligations associated with the Second Emissions Trading System (SEQE2) (subject to transcription into National Law); i€ Invoicing, including the transmission of invoices via CHORUS PRO i€ Managing relations with the Manager from the Distribution Network within the framework of a single contract, to the public distribution network; i€ Mandatory service provisions described in the common specific administrative clauses (CCAP-C) and the common specific technical clauses (CCTP-C).

input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: SAS VECNR. Summary: Global Public Performance Market Combining the Design, Construction, Operation and Maintenance of Photovoltaic Installations in Shade Houses. Description: The award procedure used is competitive dialogue subject to the provisions of articles L. 2124-4, R. 2124-5 and R. 2161-24 to R. 2161-31 of the Public Procurement Code.<br> Competitive dialogue is the procedure in which the buyer dialogues with the candidates admitted to participate in the procedure with a view to defining or developing one or more solutions by benefiting from the knowledge of bidders likely to meet its needs and on the basis of which the participants in the dialogue are invited to submit an offer.<br> This is an ordinary market for the lump sum part (DPGF) and a framework agreement with purchase orders for the unit price part (BPU).<br> For the voucher framework agreement part order, the services are settled by BPU unit prices applied to the quantities actually executed. The maximum annual amount is 20 000 euro(s) excluding tax per year for the unit price part.<br> Pursuant to article L2171-1 of the CCP, this contract derogates from the allotment obligation.<br> There is no provision for an optional tranche.<br> The procedure is broken down into two distinct phases:<br> - One application phase at the end of which the candidates admitted to submit an offer will be selected;<br> - An offer phase at the end of which the successful bidder will be chosen.<br> Following the examination of the application files, the Buyer draws up the list of candidates admitted to participate in the dialogue.... Published Date: 2025-11-13. Closing Date: 2025-12-15. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Summary: Global Public Performance Market Combining the Design, Construction, Operation and Maintenance of Photovoltaic Installations in Shade Houses

The maximum annual amount is 20 000 euro(s) excluding tax per year for the unit price part.<br> Pursuant to article L2171-1 of the CCP, this contract derogates from the allotment obligation.<br> There is no provision for an optional tranche.<br> The procedure is broken down into two distinct phases:<br> - One application phase at the end of which the candidates admitted to submit an offer will be selected;<br> - An offer phase at the end of which the successful bidder will be chosen.<br> Following the examination of the application files, the Buyer draws up the list of candidates admitted to participate in the dialogue...

input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: MUNICIPALITY OF ATTIGNAT. Summary: Heat Supply to Seven Municipal Buildings. Description: The exclusive purpose of this contract is the supply of heat produced mainly from wood energy, necessary for heating seven municipal buildings in the town of Attignat. The Contracting Authority informs candidates that its current overall cost of heat is around 180 €incl. VAT/MWh. The Contracting Authority invites the Supplier to study other connections to potential neighboring buildings, in particular to improve the project on a technical and economic level. The connection of other buildings should not lead to an increase in the price of heat. input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: TOWN OF GENNEVILLIERS. Summary: Construction of the School Group of the Zac Des Chanterainesrelaunch Macro-Lot B, Lots 8, 12 and 16. Description: Considering the phasing of the overall development project, it was decided to build this school group in two stages in order to meet the evolving and growing needs of the neighborhood:<br> - initially, it will be a question of building a school group of 20 classes corresponding to the reception capacities housing in phases 1 and 2 of the ZAC.<br> - secondly, by 2035-2040, the school group must be able to expand according to needs updated school forecasting. To date, we estimate a potential expansion of 9 classes maximum.<br> This procedure concerns uniquely the first phase but the precautionary measures necessary for the realization of the future extension are integrated into the technical hypotheses of phase 1 (structural load reduction, network sizing, electrical power, etc.).<br> Are affected by this procedure only macro-lot B, lots 8, 12 and 16 following their declaration without action for legal and technical reasons.<br> In application of article L.2113-10 of the Public Procurement Code, this consultation is broken down into 4 macro-lots and seven lots, each macro-lot or lot being the subject of a separate market, entrusted to a company or a group of companies and defined as follows:<br> - Macro-batch A composed of the following batches:<br> - Lot 01 VRD;<br> - Lot 02 Landscape;<br> - Lot 03 Structural work - Earthworks<br> - Macro-lot B composed of the following lots:<br> - Lot 04a/04b Metal and Wood Frame / .... Published Date: 2025-10-22. Closing Date: 2025-11-03. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Summary: Construction of the School Group of the Zac Des Chanterainesrelaunch Macro-Lot B, Lots 8, 12 and 16

Summary: Supply of Lubricants (Oils and Greases) and Implementation and Monitoring of a Lubrication Plan for the Needs of the Sdis 35 Shared Maintenance and Logistics Group. input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: RTE RÉSEAU DE TRANSPORT D'ELECTRICITÉ. Summary: Marine Survey by Unmanned or Autonomous Vehicles. Description: RTE, the French electricity transmission system operator, is responsible for developing, building and operating high-voltage submarine links for interconnection with neighbouring countries, or for connecting offshore wind farms to the terrestrial transmission grid. RTE currently operates a wide range of submarine cables on the Manche Channel, Atlantic and Mediterranean facades. In the future, the number of cables shall further increase with the development of HVDC long distance links to offshore wind farms. These cables can be floating or laid on the sea floor. In this context, RTE carries out regular submarine data collection campaigns during the design, construction, and operational maintenance phases of its assets. These campaigns may include bathymetric surveys, geophysical soundings, UXO findings, optical monitoring of structures or environmental monitoring and measurements. Currently carried out by conventional means (surface vessels or on foot at landfall), these investigations could in the future be carried out by autonomous or remotely-controlled robots/vehicles. In addition to reducing costs, the expected benefits include operational efficiency, reduced risk for personnel, and a smaller environmental footprint for operations, as well as the accuracy of the data collected. RTE would like to investigate on innovative autonomous or remote solutions applicable to its scope of service for cables, particularly AUVs (Autonomous Underwater Vehicles), USVs (Unmanned Surface.... Published Date: 2025-09-16. Closing Date: 2025-10-31. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: SNCF GARES & CONNECTIONS. Summary: Lnpca_Nae - Market 5 Passerelle and Canopee. Description: This file comes as part of phase 1 for the creation of a multimodal TGV/TER station (PEM = Multimodal Exchange pole) with 4 docks on the Nice St Augustin site.<br> This consists in transforming the current station of Nice St Augustn, located in the immediate vicinity of the airport from Nice.<br> The future Nae station (nae = Nice airport) will receive TER and TGV, will be fitted with a bicycle-station, a parking lot, a minute removal area and deposit/recovery taxis. It will be interconnected with the 3 tram lines in the city, the buses, bus and the airport. The market 5 portrays mostly On the manufacture and installation of the Passerelle and the bioclimatic and photovoltaic canopy.<br> Manufacturing and implementation of the Poultons access gateway to the quays and the bioclimatic canopy at the wedding airport station.<br> The work to be carried out consist in the realization of the access gateway At the quays and the bioclimatic canopy which covers the passenger building, the bridge, the plan of tracks and platforms of the Nice Airport station and associated technical lots (structural work - Art Ouvrage - VRD/ Landscape - CVC/ PLB - SOE) and are to be carried out within the framework of this single market everything State body.<br> Doc Title: LNPCA_NAE - Market 5 Passerelle and Canopee<br> Type contract: Works. Summary: Concession Contract having for Object the Financing, the Realization, the Development and the Exploitation of a Heat Network Fueled by Renewable Energy in the Territory of the Municipality .... Description: Concession contract having for object the financing, the realization, the development and the exploitation of a heat network fueled by renewable energy in the territory of the municipality ...<br> The municipality of Collonges is competent on its territory to create, develop, maintain and Manage urban heat networks.<br> As part of its policy in terms of ecological transition, and in order to continue its commitments in the field of its skills on the scale of its territory, the municipality of Collonges (01550) seeks to enhance all renewable energy sources And to limit as much as possible the use of fossil fuels for heating.<br> The network will be powered by a new boiler room with an ENR rate more than 80%.<br> The project should make it possible to limit the impact of future increases Predictable of the price of energies by mainly using a fuel which is not dependent on variations in the price of the barrel of oil and the Euros/dollars parity. It could also allow the development of a regional sector promoting job creation.<br> The wood-energy network should allow invoicing according to the VAT at reduced rate 5.5% on the fixed share (power subscribed by the subscriber) and on the variable share (amount of energy consumed by the subscriber and covering the purchase of the energies necessary for heat production). In parallel the maintenance costs and improvement of boilers would be removed and replaced by the simple interview of an interchange.<br> By deliberation, the city retained the principle of the delegation of public service, in the form of .... Published Date: 2025-07-31. Closing Date: 2025-09-15. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: MINISTRY OF ECOLOGICAL TRANSITION. Summary: Ao Relating to the Realization and Operation of Electricity Production Facilities from Solar Photovoltaic, Hydroelectric or Wind Energy Located in Mainland Metropolitan France. Description: The call for tenders relates to the realization and operation of electricity production facilities located in continental metropolitan France which use photovoltaic, hydroelectric or mechanical energy of the wind. Under the 2o of article L. 311-12 of the energy code, the Candidates selected appointed by the Minister responsible for energy benefit from a contract for the supplement of remuneration for the electricity produced, established according to the provisions of articles L. 311-13-2 to L. 311-13-4 of the energy code and in the procedures specified by the specifications.<br> AU relating to the realization and operation of electricity production facilities from solar photovoltaic, hydroelectric or wind energy located in mainland metropolitan France<br> Are eligible for this call for tenders, installations not eligible for a purchase contract taken in Application of a decree mentioned in article R. 314-12 of the energy code and which are:-photovoltaic installations on the ground, or; - Photovoltaic installations on buildings, greenhouses, hangars or shades (designated by photovoltaic installations on buildings in the suite), or; - hydroelectric installations, or; - Wind installations. For photovoltaic installations on the ground, an additional eligibility condition for this call for tenders is that their power is between 500 kWc and 30 MWC for projects on the ground corresponding to cases 1 and 2 d .... Published Date: 2025-07-03. Closing Date: 2025-10-10. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed
